name: Carter Kryzak
content: My name is Carter Kryzak and I am a sophomore mathematics and economics major from Coppell, Texas; but more importantly, I am the loudest and the proudest member of the Fightin Texas Aggie class of 2023, A-A-A-A-A! I have a passion for sports (especially Aggie basketball and baseball), and I enjoy playing Mario Kart and Wii Golf with my friends. My favorite Aggie tradition is saying “howdy.”
